nodes.text: The Mission to Numidian Prime was a mission by the Jedi Master Dooku and his Padawan Qui-Gon Jinn to capture the notorious bounty hunter and mass killer Shenda Mol on Numidian Prime. Mol was able to get the drop on Jinn, but Dooku was able to intervene, shocking her with Force lightning and subduing her.
The Mission to Numidian Prime appears in the 2019 novel Master & Apprentice, written by Claudia Gray.
